task_summary: The robot must avoid an obstacle (books) and reach the blue pen on a desk.

task_long_description.overview: This episode features a single-armed robot operating on a tabletop workspace. The primary objective is to reach the blue pen placed behind a stack of books, which act as obstacles. The robot is required to detect the pen, plan a collision-free approach, circumvent the blocking books, and align precisely with the pen to reach it without contact.
preconditions: Workspace is clear except for books (obstacle) and blue pen (goal)
Initial robot pose is away from the obstacle
stepwise_plan: Locate the blue pen using perception.
Move the end-effector above the pen, avoiding collisions.
If not at pen, sidestep around the obstacle using small increments.
Once at the correct location, align precisely to reach the pen.
success_criteria: Robot is positioned at the target (blue pen) with clear path around the obstacle.
failure_and_recovery: If the pen is not visible, perform spiral search.
If motion is blocked, retry MoveDelta up to 3 times.
task_long_description.termination: Behavior terminates when the robot is aligned above the blue pen, obstacle avoided.

frame_3.now_evidence: first stable contact and alignment cue visible
frame_3.predicts_next: push actuation expected; confirms goal direction

task_instruction: avoid obstacle and reach the blue pen

node_specs.description: Checks if the blue pen is visible.
Performs a spiral scan to find the blue pen.
Moves the end-effector above the blue pen, safe from obstacles.
Checks if robot is at the blue pen target.
Makes a small movement along y-axis to skirt obstacle.
Final precise approach and alignment to the blue pen.

failure_modes: Motion command (MoveDelta) fails due to collision
recovery_strategy: Retry scan up to 3 times if pen not visible
Incremental MoveDelta (y) sidesteps repeated if not at goal
assumptions: The blue pen is uniquely identified as 'blue_pen' in the environment.
Books are treated as static obstacles; indirect avoidance via MoveDelta increments.
Instruction only broadly specifies obstacle avoidance; frames confirm presence and location.
No explicit obstacle detection or mapping action in library, so avoidance is implicit via MoveDelta.
No grasp or pickup required; just reach/alignment.

expected_success_criteria: Robot end-effector above and aligned with blue pen, despite obstacle.
